entry.data:
CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS AROUND 80

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
